Package lv.team3.botcovidlab.adapter.telegram.cache

Class PatientDataCache

java.lang.Object
lv.team3.botcovidlab.adapter.telegram.cache.PatientDataCache
@Component
public class PatientDataCache
extends java.lang.Object
In-memory cache. patientsBotStates: chat_id and Patient's bot state patientsData: chat_id and Patient's profile data.
Author:
Vladislavs Kraslavskis

      public static void setPatiensCountry​(java.lang.Long userId, java.lang.String country)

    • getPatientsCountry

      public static java.lang.String getPatientsCountry​(java.lang.Long userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - Telegram users chat identifier
      Returns:
      Name of the country. This param is used, to understand for which country stats, user is asking for.

    • setPatiensCurrentBotState

      public static void setPatiensCurrentBotState​(java.lang.Long userId, BotStates botState)
      Parameters:
      userId - Requested users Telegram chat identifier
      botState - Represents current users state. This param is used, to understand what text bot should show to user.

    • getPreviousBotState

      public static BotStates getPreviousBotState​(java.lang.Long userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - Telegram users chat identifier
      Returns:
      Patients Bot State. This param is used, to understand in which state bot was before questionnarie started.

      public static BotStates getPatientsCurrentBotState​(java.lang.Long userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - Telegram users chat identifier
      Returns:
      Patients Bot State. This param is used, to understand in which state is bot now.

    • savePatientsProfileData

      public static void savePatientsProfileData​(java.lang.Long userId, Patient patient)
      Saves patient in patientsData hashMap
      Parameters:
      userId - Telegram users chat identifier
      patient - Patient object, which needs to be saved to the Cache
